page.title: 15Teenage view of Village Life
page.content: Most of the teenagers interviewed in the past few weeks seem to enjoy living in a village like Scalford, especially in the summer time. At that time of the year everyone hangs around together and it is easy to find things to do in the village. Sometimes everyone joins in water fights which are great fun,or in other outdoor games. Village life is not so popular with teenagers in winter time. They have problems in getting transport to events in the town and there is less to do in the village. Badminton and Youth Club are the only organised entertainments available. A few teenagers do not enjoy village life at all, they would rather live in a town where there is more entertainment.
